summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York circulating an email and attachments for further review related to the Epstein case. The document indicates internal review and sharing of potentially relevant materials.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email who is circulating an email and attachments for further review within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Internal Review Email Circulation
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney circulates an email and attachments for further review within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: An internal email from March 26, 2021 shows ongoing review of materials related to the Epstein case within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email includes attachments (USVP00157303.pdf and USVP00157304.pdf) that were tagged for further review.
The correspondence indicates continued internal scrutiny and sharing of documents among prosecutors years after Epstein's death.
